General.Name: Medical Services International Inc
General.Description: Medical Services International, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in medically-related businesses. The company operates medical facilities on the island of Anguilla, British West Indies that supply medical diagnostic services and dialysis. The facility combines the recreational aspects of a Caribbean destination with the availability of North American medical services. In addition, the company manufactures a line of VScan rapid test kits for rapid, initial point-of-care screening for HIV 1 & 2, Hepatitis B and C, Tuberculosis, West Nile virus, and Dengue Fever. Further, it conducts, under contract, clinical studies for experimental new medical treatments. Medical Services International was previously known as TRAC Industries, Inc. It changed its name to Medical Resorts International, Inc. and subsequently changed its name to Medical Services International, Inc. in 2001. Medical Services International was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Edmonton, Canada.

1.Name: Mr. Brent  Platten
1.Title: Director and Head of Special Projects
